vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.32;
also called Hashem at 1Ch.11.34;
Also named: ha.shem (הָשֵׁם "Hashem" H2044)
§ Jashen = "sleeping"
the father of one or more of David's mighty warriors
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (2) הָשֵׁם   guerrero; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅善 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "睡著的"
大衛王的一名或多名大能勇士之父親(撒下 23:32)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅善 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "睡着的"
大卫王的一名或多名大能勇士之父亲(撒下 23:32)
